task: Fetch data from an API and display it in the console.
description: Use the Fetch API to get data from a public API and log it to the console.
solution:
```javascript
fetch('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users')
  .then(response => response.json())
  .then(data => console.log(data))
  .catch(error => console.error('Error fetching data:', error));```
